text: When I think of myself at 15, even 17, I could simply not have done this work on an international level and travel all the time, take care of myself and not feel lost. I feel very happy that this is happening now, and not 10 years ago, as I feel stronger as a person.

text: I only travel to good material, a good director and a good company. I won't work in another country for a year any longer, because I have a lovely wife and I adore her and I can't bear to be away from her.
author: Jim Dale

text: Modeling has given me the opportunity to travel outside of Brazil and see the world. I have been meeting many interesting and talented people along the way.
author: Izabel Goulart

text: As a person, I was born to give out my opinions. By giving out my opinions, I realize who I am. As long as I can communicate, I'm not so lonely. If I cannot travel, or do art, or have company, if they take away all my belongings, it doesn't matter at all.

text: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.

text: I travel 330 days a year and eat every two and a half hours - I'm a big guy. I always carry a fork, little bottles of spices, and Sriracha. I eat what I feel like eating.

text: I have no plans to have any other home than Moscow. However, I love to travel, and I'm very comfortable in New York. In many ways, it reminds me of Moscow in its energy and drive.

text: I want to see friends more and travel more.

text: But I want people to understand that poker's not all glamorous, it's not all being on TV and making tons of money. It's a hard life. It's a lot of travel. It's a lot of weird hours.

text: The Queen Mary was the most civilized and luxurious way one could travel to America in the late 1930s.

text: I used to travel in tennis shoes I am just not allowed to anymore. I'm an old hippie from San Francisco.

text: If you travel to the States... they have a lot of different words than like what we use. For instance: they say 'elevator', we say 'lift' they say 'drapes', we say 'curtains' they say 'president', we say 'seriously deranged git.'

text: I've three children, three grandchildren, I work, I travel, and I'm very happily married. I'm very satisfied and happy with my life and there really isn't anything I want.

text: When I travel, I love speaking to women around the world about the things that inspire them, the fashions they like, what makes something good and what would make it even better.

text: Golf is growing, and there are more good young players, but you don't see them going abroad. It's so expensive to travel.

text: I travel for work, but recently, friends said I should take major trips.

text: For people to understand me when I travel, I speak with my hands.

text: You have all these people in the city and everything has become centralized. If you live outside the city and you need a birth certificate or some official paper from the government, you have to travel to the city.

text: If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.

text: The good news is that real-world hands-on conservation is alive and well and catching on across the America I travel.

text: My kids started school, so having a strong base in Melbourne has been a key priority. I'm not daunted by the travel. People say, 'It's so far to Australia,' and I say, 'You get on the plane, you eat well, you sleep, you wake up - and you're there.'

text: When you're a kid, I think you want to be a film star. And I'm not as enamoured with that any more. The reality of that life is a lot of travel, and a lot of being away, which is impractical because I have four children, so I don't want to be away that much, not the other side of the world away.

text: My writing is a combination of three elements. The first is travel: not travel like a tourist, but travel as exploration. The second is reading literature on the subject. The third is reflection.

text: I have to travel a lot, but relaxation to me is when I am at home.

text: I've got a real sense of three-dimensional geometry. I can look at a flat piece of fabric and know that if I put a slit in it and make some fabric travel around a square, then when you lift it up it will drape in a certain way, and I can feel how that will happen.

text: I can travel anywhere in the world and I can pretty much fit in.

text: I love to take risks, I love to travel, and I'm very outdoor-sy, so any girl who can pick up a football and throw a spiral will definitely catch my attention.

text: My ideal travel companions are my surfboard, wetsuit, and guitar.

text: It's a unique situation as well because England is a small country, so it makes it easy for the fans to travel. If we play down in London, they get buses and we'll get three or four thousand fans come down. They'll all sit in the same area and show their support for the team.

text: Yeah. I've been pretty fortunate to travel I guess, all around the place.

text: I can't travel without Sudoku.

text: Everywhere I travel throughout Eastern Washington, I hear from people demanding we do a better job of controlling our borders and reducing illegal immigration.

text: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work.

text: People say, what is she thinking? I'm thinking: fun cash travel.

text: A wise traveler never despises his own country.

text: I like to go to work, and also, I don't have any kids. I don't have any hobbies. I don't like to travel. So going to work is kind of it.

text: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners.

text: I'm a travel enthusiast.

text: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel.

text: You had to make a camera look like it's traveling at 300 mph, but you couldn't make it actually travel at 300 mph so you had to slow everything down and build devices to do that. So you were constantly engineering.

text: Occasionally I find a travel book that is both illuminating and entertaining, where vivid writing and research replace self-indulgence and sloppy prose.

text: Some minds improve by travel, others, rather, resemble copper wire, or brass, which get the narrower by going farther.

text: But you can travel on for ten thousand miles, and still stay where you are.

text: A lot of people say that comedy doesn't travel well. I found it very accessible.

text: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags.

text: I am living out my adolescent dream of travel and adventure.

text: I'm a big fan of doing 'Triple D.' But I don't want to do it forever, don't get me wrong! Travel away from my family, are you crazy? But do you know what it does for these mom-and-pop restaurant joints? It changes their lives forever. I mean, their businesses will never be the same.

text: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.

text: To enjoy enduring success we should travel a little in advance of the world.

text: The time to enjoy a European trip is about three weeks after unpacking.

text: And, obviously as a, as one who likes to travel around myself a lot, I think the Earth is a beautiful place. And, I'm looking forward to some new perspectives.

text: If somebody asked me about my inspiration I would say that it's not the peopleand it's not the things, it's travel and experiencing different environments.

text: This is my first opportunity to visit this part of North Africa, so I am going to be able to go back home and talk about this beautiful country and encourage Americans to travel here.

text: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.

text: It's like this - because I travel so much, I crave certain foods or certain things, like from certain places that I've been.

text: I was always very determined and ambitious, and I knew I would do something that would let me travel and stuff, but I didn't know really know what I would do to get there.

text: What I like in this job is you can travel to many places, many imaginations.

text: Ridiculous stuff happens when I travel.

text: I wanted to be looked at for the skateboarder that I was. I didn't want to be the 36-year-old skateboarder who's still holding on while owning a company at the same time. I wanted to make my mark and travel and accomplish a few things here and there and then get out.

text: I never make a trip to the United States without visiting a supermarket. To me they are more fascinating than any fashion salon.

text: As far as my favorite sites, I do a lot of mundane stuff on line because I travel so much.

text: The more you travel, the more well-off you'll be, I think.

text: Strange, is it not? That of the myriads who Before us pass'd the door of Darkness through, Not one returns to tell us of the Road Which to discover we must travel too.

text: Unlike some of the time-travel movies I love, like 'Primer' or '12 Monkeys,' 'Looper' is not about time travel. It's about this situation that time travel creates and the people dealing with that situation. So narratively, the big challenge was to have time travel get out of the way.

text: I'm obsessed with Nicholas Sparks. I've literally read every single book, because every time I travel, at the airport, I always buy a new Nicholas Sparks book.

text: Before we had the kids, my husband and I were traveling a lot and working and really enjoying our lives and each other. We both love the theater and books and travel and so we were really having a lot of fun.

text: An English man does not travel to see English men.

text: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
author: Hilaire Belloc

text: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.

text: I am blessed for what I have, but I believed in it from the beginning. Today, the dream is the same: I still want to travel, I still want to entertain, and I most certainly still want to have fun.

text: When I'm in London I do have the convenience of being close to St James Park which is also good for me because it gives me an excuse to get out and get some much needed exercise!

text: Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends.

text: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.

text: Travelling expands the mind rarely.

text: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.

text: It is not fit that every man should travel it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.

text: A world with a sudden limit on air travel would be tremendously different from the one we live in now.

text: I fly economy. I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.

text: I have gotten to travel the world and experience all these incredible things thanks to my career.

text: This evening I wish to suggest that we Christians should accompany people on their pilgrimages. Specifically we should travel with people as they search for the good, the true and the beautiful.

text: I like to travel and connect.
author: Richard Powers

text: I am traveling less in order to be able to write more. I select my travel destinations according to their degree of usefulness to my work.

text: I love to not work. I like to travel. I work maybe half the year, no more.

text: We must go beyond textbooks, go out into the bypaths and untrodden depths of the wilderness and travel and explore and tell the world the glories of our journey.

text: The need for this clinic is clear to me, to the veterans who are currently forced to travel hours to receive care, and even to the Veterans Administration that itself identified creation of a clinic in this part of our state as a priority to be completed by 2006.

text: I hope that I'll be hot for a long time so I can make a lot of money, I can retire early, and just travel. Hopefully that will happen.

text: I grew up in South Africa and I would look at maps and we were at the bottom of the world. There was this whole thing up there. I was always reading encyclopedias about the world. So travel was something I was always attracted to.

text: I've always traveled, as a kid my parents moved me around, a different place in Germany every four years. But I got the travel bug when I was a kid, living in different countries.

text: Dealing with global warming doesn't mean we have all got to suddenly stop breathing. Dealing with global warming means that we have to stop waste, and if you travel for no reason whatsoever, that is a waste.

text: I hope to have more time to think, to look at the sky, dealing with less crisis management, to learn another language, to travel.

text: I enjoy the preparatory elements of travel - packing my bags and choosing my outfits - but my favourite part is getting there.
author: Dominic Monaghan

text: I was always just into my music and maybe into trying to save the world a little bit. I never really thought I'd have a hit record or anything like that. I was prepared to travel around all over the country, kind of like a Johnny Appleseed, and sing.

text: I intend to travel to Okinawa and to visit with Okinawa officials and the citizens of Okinawa at an early date. I will send my best analysis of that situation, including the local attitudes, back to Washington, to the government there.

text: You become a better writer by writing. You become a better travel writer by writing about travel.

text: Taking time to sit back and watch and think about what you've seen is important. Traveling did a great deal to me. I found that when I travel and just sit in the corner and watch, a million ideas come to me.

text: I travel a lot. If you look at my suitcase, everything is extremely well-packed and well-folded people who travel with me are impressed at how organized I am. Some would refer to me as a maniac for this.

text: You have to travel globally today to know what's going on and maintain an edge.

text: Each and every one of the security measures we implement serves an important goal: providing safe and efficient air travel for the millions of people who rely on our aviation system every day.
author: Janet Napolitano

text: My job is to be a spokesman - the spokesman, I suppose - for the President, for the White House, to do the daily briefings, to manage the press corps in terms of travel, day-to-day needs, access, interviews, all those issues.
author: Dee Dee Myers

text: The way to Heaven is ascending we must be content to travel uphill, though it be hard and tiresome, and contrary to the natural bias of our flesh.
author: Jonathan Edwards

text: I read everything: fiction, history, science, mathematics, biography, travel.
author: Martin Lewis Perl

text: It's been a huge blessing, being able to travel and have a great life.
author: Seann William Scott

text: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.

text: As the President has indicated, my life has been a life of travel - for 60 years constantly moving over the wide world on journeys which first and last have taken me to 83 countries, and, what is more significant, to most of them again and again.

text: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.
author: Ella Maillart

text: I'm terrified of bugs and I travel with sprays, lotions, potions the lot. I have to check the room before I go to sleep and if I come across a bug and fail to remove it I have to sleep in a separate room as I'm paranoid that I'll be taken advantage of as I sleep.

text: The one thing I regret was that my work required an enormous amount of my time, and a lot of travel.

text: Everything has been homogenized. Over time, with television and jet travel, everybody has blended together. Some of our wonderful charm has been lost.

text: When I was deputy chairman I could travel from Glasgow to Edinburgh without leaving Tory land. In a two-week period I covered every constituency in which we had an MP. There were 14. Now we have only one. We appear to have given up.

text: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.

text: You know among people who kind of travel a lot and have exposure to the United States and some other countries, they do have accounts, but you know, Russia is not exactly the place with multiple language skills so local networks kind of have an edge.

text: What should I have known or written had I been a quiet, mercantile politician or a lord in waiting? A man must travel, and turmoil, or there is no existence.

text: Our government shouldn't tell us where to travel and where not to travel.

text: I have been able to travel all over the country and see many places that I probably never would have visited. I have also participated in many charity events for worthy causes.
author: Rob Mariano

text: I love short trips to New York to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.
author: James Cameron

text: Writing allows me the time to travel and see the world, which is what I always wanted to do. I'd really like to have been Sir Richard Francis Burton, but it's the wrong century.

text: I never subscribe to the stay-at-home policy. I'm not sick of the road or sick of eating in good restaurants around the country. I like to travel.
author: Levon Helm

text: I get to travel, see the world, meet people and be independent. I feel blessed.
author: Bar Refaeli

text: The world is a country which nobody ever yet knew by description one must travel through it one's self to be acquainted with it.
author: Lord Chesterfield

text: You know more of a road by having traveled it than by all the conjectures and descriptions in the world.
author: William Hazlitt

text: In this world, shipmates, sin that pays its way can travel freely, and without passport whereas Virtue, if a pauper, is stopped at all frontiers.
author: Herman Melville

text: But my sense in talking to people when I travel is that the film business is not that dissimilar from a lot of other businesses.
author: Steven Soderbergh

text: However, we still have the problem of free travel and movement, since the Travel Documents issued by UNMIK as the substitute to passports, are not fully recognized yet by all countries.
author: Ibrahim Rugova

text: All of my friends are animal people. To me, cats are people, too. Animals are people, too. I travel a lot and when I go overseas, it's really hard on me because the animals are treated much differently, especially in developing countries.
author: AnnaLynne McCord

text: I think it's important that kids have responsibilities and understand the value of things, but I think it's great I get to travel the world with my daughter.
author: Salma Hayek

text: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.
author: Henry Adams

text: I'm such a girl for the living room. I really like to stay in my nest and not move. I travel in my mind, and that that's a rigorous state of journeying for me. My body isn't that interested in moving from place to place.
author: Bell Hooks

text: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes.
author: Robin Leach

text: To read a writer is for me not merely to get an idea of what he says, but to go off with him and travel in his company.
author: Andre Gide

text: On long haul flights I always drink loads and loads of water and eat light and healthy food.
author: Lisa Snowdon

text: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: I usually just have one cat. It is difficult, but I have my one cat that he'll travel with me if it's appropriate, if I'm not going overseas.
author: Gina Gershon

text: I like to be at home because I just travel so much. I have four dogs, golden retrievers.
author: Denise Richards

text: I've always been a big fan of time travel, and I'm very into the notion that some day we'll be able to do it. Beam me up!
author: Scott Bakula

text: I really enjoy travel, I enjoy the U.K., I enjoy Scotland, Glasgow.
author: George Wendt

text: And now I have a big house, nice clothes and I travel in first class and I love it, so maybe it's time to enjoy being a star.
author: Vincent Cassel

text: The genre has moved into this commercial aspect of itself, and ignored this extraordinarily rich literature that's filed everywhere else except under travel.
author: Robyn Davidson

text: Travel books are, by and large, boring. They lodge uncomfortably between fact, fiction and autobiography.
author: Arthur Smith

text: We've got fuel prices coming down and good travel numbers coming out, so it's not surprising airline stocks are going up.
author: Andrew Sullivan

text: I didn't realize what an impact having a No. 1 single would have. It connects me with people of different ages, and I get to travel all over the world.
author: Lisa Loeb

text: The man who never in his mind and thoughts travel'd to heaven is no artist.
author: William Blake

text: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel.
author: David Attenborough

text: I never travel without my sketch book.
author: Ian Wright

text: Amtrak offers riders a cost-effective way to travel throughout the country.
author: Tim Bishop

text: You get educated by traveling.
author: Solange Knowles

text: The photograph reverses the purpose of travel, which until now had been to encounter the strange and unfamiliar.
author: Marshall McLuhan

text: To travel hopefully is better than to arrive.
author: James Jeans

text: I sometimes skip meals when I travel.
author: Amy Smart

text: I get cold - really cold - when I travel.
author: Laura Linney

text: What has happened to the good old-fashioned travel agent? I want to go to a really posh travel agent and have them organise everything for me. I don't want to do things on the Internet.
author: Jenny Eclair

text: Yes, I travel in unusual circles. George Osborne and his wife Frances are my cousins.
author: Daryl Hall

text: Traveling is my form of self-education. Every stream I fish now is not as good as it used to be. Traveling is my form of self-education. Every stream I fish now is not as good as it used to be. If you keep your eyes open as you travel around, you realize we are destroying this planet.
author: Yvon Chouinard

text: I think it's important to travel around in order to get a notion of what's going on, to find out what people are think about. I enjoy talking on campuses most because people are more informed and discussion is generally livelier.
author: Harrison Salisbury

text: Lovers of air travel find it exhilarating to hang poised between the illusion of immortality and the fact of death.
author: Alexander Chase

text: A travel book is about someone who goes somewhere, travels on the ground, sees something and spends quite a lot of time doing it, and has a hard time, and then comes back and writes about it. It's not about inventing.
author: Paul Theroux

text: Strange - is it not? That of the myriads who Before us passed the door of Darkness through, Not one returns to tell us of the road Which to discover we must travel too.
author: Horace

text: Actually, I started to become an actress because I met someone who was just a friend and I found his life wonderful, I thought, Oh my god, you can travel, you're free, you can do what you want, you're the boss. And then I met an actor and I was in love with him.
author: Lea Seydoux

text: If I had children, I would be very selfish. I wouldn't be out doing things. But by not having kids, it makes me freer to travel the world and talk about things I feel are important.
author: Linda Blair

text: I can't wait to start something up myself that is actually about giving unsigned bands the exposure they deserve, especially when they travel so far to play the smallest gig they've ever played in their lives.
author: Dan Hawkins

text: Whenever I travel anywhere, I'm constantly asked if I'm Swedish. It's the burden of most Norwegians. The Swedes have just got a better publicity agent, I think.
author: Christopher Heyerdahl

text: I have to travel a lot for work.
author: James Purefoy

text: It's very expensive to be a professional tennis player with all the travel and the flights and the hotels and everything.
author: Caroline Wozniacki

text: I want to teach. I want to speak. I want to travel.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
author: Danny Kaye

text: So it allows me to travel, I'll be doing that and running these great rivers and doing what I've done in the past without much purpose other than for the experience.
author: Richard Dean Anderson

text: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money.
author: Lewis Hallam

text: I really enjoy what I do, and who I'm with and where I am. Having said that, I'm not really a person of habit, because what I do in my job is travel around the world and play concerts to people, and occasionally do very weird things.
author: Robert Smith

text: I travel Europe every couple of weeks. I just came back from London, Holland and Denmark. Every nation on this planet has its issues with race, and I am not sure if everyone has figured out how to deal with it.
author: Montel Williams

text: You travel across the country, you visit departments, you give talks, you talk about the work at your laboratory - what's going on, what the opportunities are there - you talk about your own research.
author: Frank Press

text: When I thought I was retired, I wanted to travel around the world and watch soccer games.
author: Drew Carey

text: I travel. I do a lot of traveling around the world.
author: Chris Tucker

text: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice.
author: Linda McCartney

text: I love to travel, but sometimes it's nice to stay in one place.
author: Gustavo Dudamel

text: For many years, it seemed as if nothing changed in Norway. You could leave the country for three months, travel the world, through coups d'etat, assassinations, famines, massacres and tsunamis, and come home to find that the only new thing in the newspapers was the crossword puzzle.
author: Jo Nesbo

text: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
author: Aldous Huxley

text: I was afterwards sorry for this, though, if I ever travel again, I shall trust to none but natives, as the climate of Africa is too trying to foreigners.
author: John H. Speke

text: Since traveling is such a big part of my life when I am working, I like to vacation relatively close to home. Florida is a great place for me to go and relax. It's so close, which is perfect because it's the minimal travel time.
author: Hilary Rhoda

text: Even when my parents were together, they both had to travel and work, and it wasn't like they had nine-to-five jobs. In that way, it wasn't a normal family life.
author: Georgia Jagger

text: I don't travel anywhere without the PS3 and XBox. There's nothing better to do on long bus trips while on tour.
author: Soulja Boy

text: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another.
author: Roger Moore

text: We have so much pride in welcoming these passengers onto the plane, and they have so much pride in travel. It's something that I definitely always remember, when I'm playing a scene on the plane, just to imbue everything with that sense of excitement.
author: Christina Ricci

text: Book tours and research provide a lot of travel - too much, I sometimes think, but we do take vacations.
author: Bernard Cornwell

text: People think I'm crazy because I travel too much, but I haven't been doing any of that lately because I got a little sick this year and I've tried to take care of it.
author: Lee Hazlewood

text: When I began writing that I was able and did travel and met some fascinating people and also uncovered some history, which has not been discovered before.
author: Arthur Hailey

text: The hardest part is to travel, and to be away from your family.
author: Glenn Tipton

text: I've been lucky to travel through quite a bit of Europe and Australia, but I would love to do Asia and South America and South Africa.
author: Dianna Agron

text: Almost 70 percent of U.S. ag exports travel the upper Mississippi River and the Illinois waterway system.
author: Jerry Costello

text: Air travel is the safest form of travel aside from walking even then, the chances of being hit by a public bus at 30,000 feet are remarkably slim. I also have no problem with confined spaces. Or heights. What I am afraid of is speed.
author: Sloane Crosley

text: Travel aesthetics should be just as comfortable and practical as they are fashionable.
author: Miguel Jontel Pimentel

text: There are those who travel and those who are going somewhere. They are different and yet they are the same. The success has this over his rivals: He knows where he is going.
author: Mark Caine

text: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal.
author: Maria Sharapova

text: When you travel, remember that a foreign country is not designed to make you comfortable. It is designed to make its own people comfortable.
author: Clifton Paul Fadiman

text: By the time I'm 40, interplanetary travel will be common. Nobody will want to talk to me at that age, anyway.
author: Ace Frehley

text: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.
author: George Eliot

text: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
author: Susan Sontag

text: I travel all over the country making speeches for people I believe in.
author: Ann Richards

text: But when I really look back on my life, being really honest about it and now that I've got the chance to travel the world, seeing how a lot of little kids grow up - my life wasn't so bad.
author: Coolio

text: I'm extremely blessed because I travel extensively for my work, but I always try to incorporate a bit of leisure with business.
author: Linda Gray

text: Right now I'm so old that if I had a big gush of money, I don't know what I'd do with it. I don't travel anymore. I don't need anything, don't want anything. I'd give it to my son, I guess, and let him enjoy it.
author: Jack Vance

text: I don't write under the ghost of Faulkner. I live in the same town and find his life and work inspiring, but that's it. I have a motorcycle and tool along the country lanes. I travel at my own speed.
author: Barry Hannah

text: When I travel abroad, because I'm Columbian, I'm always one that they check twice and security and I'm the one that they open my bag and the one they pull to the side to check the visa.
author: Sofia Vergara

text: Traveling, you realize that differences are lost: each city takes to resembling all cities, places exchange their form, order, distances, a shapeless dust cloud invades the continents.
author: Italo Calvino

text: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.
author: William Blake

text: Rocket scientists agree that we have about reached the limit of our ability to travel in space using chemical rockets. To achieve anything near the speed of light we will need a new energy source and a new propellant. Nuclear fission is not an option.
author: Wilson Greatbatch

text: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
author: Loretta Lynn

text: There are days when I intentionally don't write. For instance, I never write when I'm traveling, because travel is a situation where I can learn more by looking and listening than by working.
author: Thomas Perry

text: Movie acting is a great job for your twenties: You travel all over, you have affairs with people, and you throw yourself into one part and then another. It gets more challenging as you get older, and it's not just having a daughter, it's wanting to have your own life and be yourself.
author: Helen Hunt

text: We are going to sign a treaty with Mexico. We are competing internationally. We need another international airport for international cargo, international travel, international businesses.
author: Richard M. Daley

text: No matter how you travel, it's still you going.
author: Jeff Goldblum

text: I always want to give my best and do the best I can. I know when I have sung my best and when I haven't. There can be stresses and hassles with time travel and press attention. I just have to adapt and find a way of dealing with it.
author: Katherine Jenkins

text: There are so many things I want to do. Like, I want to get an artist, a musician, a photographer, and a bunch of dancers that I know and just travel across Africa and just film it and just see what happens. Do and learn as much as I possibly can. Luckily, I have a lot more time.
author: Channing Tatum

text: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.
author: Aristophanes

text: Could I say that the reason that I am here today, you know, from the mouth of the State Department itself, is: I should not be allowed to travel because I have struggled for years for the independence of the colonial peoples of Africa.
author: Paul Robeson

text: Too often travel, instead of broadening the mind, merely lengthens the conversation.
author: Elizabeth Drew

text: You can't expect the entire world to come to New York to see you. You have to travel to them.
author: Theodore Bikel

text: The fact that people will pay you to talk to people and travel to interesting places and write about what intrigues you, I am just amazed by that.
author: Nicholas D. Kristof

text: My wife and I have so much fun when we travel and find anything... like stray cats and squirrels.
author: Eric Roberts

text: An unexpected benefit of my career in biochemistry has been travel.
author: Paul D. Boyer

text: My ideal travel companions are my family.
author: Pharrell Williams

text: I think travel is probably the downside of playing professional golf, but you've got to do it.
author: Karrie Webb

text: When I haven't been working I've tried to travel a lot.
author: Emma Watson

text: I enjoyed working as a model a lot as it let me travel and I got to do some really interesting projects.
author: Patricia Velasquez

text: I travel without barely any luggage. Just a second set of underwear and binoculars and a map and a toothbrush.
author: Werner Herzog

text: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: Our covering ministry is Challenge for Christ ministries, and Travel the Road was solely our mission arm, designed to expose people to what missions are, then connect them with agencies that send people out.
author: Michael Scott

text: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
author: Donny Robinson

text: I do have to travel a lot for speaking engagements.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

text: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel.
author: Renee Fleming

text: The thing I love about being an actor is the ability to travel and experience new cultures.
author: Paul Wesley
